price: 21. “Dit is de Dag des Oordeels die jullie ontkenden.”
arabic: هَٰذَا يَوۡمُ ٱلۡفَصۡلِ ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: hādhā yawmu al-faṣli alladhī kuntum bihi tukadhibūna
